SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="ee4a8f60ba214ba286f46d215be9c53a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal07"/]Dalmo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ee4a8f60ba214ba286f46d215be9c53a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The moment I heard about the creatures
of this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I knew I had to come learn
more about them![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ee4a8f60ba214ba286f46d215be9c53a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I dream of compiling everything we learn
about the ecology of each fierce little
darling here into some kind of field guide!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="23258671d8a24a5f850c04bd142e7a07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]If I hadn't gotten stranded,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] imagine how
many cute little critters I would have
encountered by now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23258671d8a24a5f850c04bd142e7a07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]It's almost embarrassing that I came here
to learn about them and haven't laid eyes
on a single one.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23258671d8a24a5f850c04bd142e7a07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Wait![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You must encounter all kinds of
creatures on your explorations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
tell me everything about them![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23258671d8a24a5f850c04bd142e7a07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Naturally,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll prepare a token of my
gratitude.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Anything to learn about more
of these sweet feral muffins!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="20aea5c92e634ae88163fbc4131d88c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I've made so many new discoveries while
reading through the Piklopedia.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't help
falling in love with all these squishy beans![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="20aea5c92e634ae88163fbc4131d88c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Come read the entries with me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We can be
enchanted by them together!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="bb33ffcdcbeb4f6eb36b46b77798dffb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] tell me every detail about the
creatures here![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Imagining them will bring
me joy as I document each and every one.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="d5d007a65950400a9b512c8a7d718c9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Just imagining unknown creatures makes
my little heart go ba-bump,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] tha-thump!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="8389bfde97f847fb83bc9edbe2e2d2ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] tell me every detail about the
creatures here![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Imagining them will bring
me joy as I document each and every one.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="bb5cb023c810465c907a319b36e81c05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Do you think that somewhere on this
planet, creatures we haven't seen
yet are waiting to be found?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="5cf7f952dc914bf7bdeaf4cae16e5a71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] tell me every detail about the
creatures here![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Imagining them will bring
me joy as I document each and every one.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="02488e21397c4df1b88adbf578577806" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You gave me so much info about the
creatures here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Tell meâ€”did
any particular one touch your heart?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="bfacce38589e4fb99e9faeacee8aaab0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] tell me every detail about the
creatures here![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Imagining them will bring
me joy as I document each and every one.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="26250526107f41a1afcb777827736ec9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ahhh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's almost done now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's starting to
look like a real Piklopedia,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you think?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="c4445c3897f9461a8ba9f62f853dc896" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Just a little more and my Piklopedia will
be complete.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let me know right away if
you find any more cuddle bunches, OK?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="653120f2286d4c1797e486b4e13af38b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ahhh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't be happier![etc:Wait frame="15"/] At last,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the
Piklopedia of my dreams is complete![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="653120f2286d4c1797e486b4e13af38b" Scale="1"/]This extraordinary book is sweet yet
ferocious,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] adorable yet dangerous...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's the most exceptional book of its kind!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="9403dda013384975be83cb1b45500d28" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]This is it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] A record of love for all nature![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We wove this together through hard work
and dedication.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9403dda013384975be83cb1b45500d28" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Reflecting on the little darlings we've
encountered so far...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It makes my heart
beat triple time!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="082971214eaf47449bda7fe9ebab2ba1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Thank you for your help![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I feel like an
empty place inside me is being filled up!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="e3855c72702f499e82ba2b789d28e2b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ahhh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that was so fascinating.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You must
let me know if you find any more new
snarly snugglers out there!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="b8035bf9b54d4309b0870238dbe3b5b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've already investigated all the
creatures?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I admire how devoted you are
to learning about them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b8035bf9b54d4309b0870238dbe3b5b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Don't waste any time![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Tell me every
last detail!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="2cedb4f5b644404da6b6f3cad6af771a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Ahhh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this little one is as cute as a button,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but so is that one![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't choose![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2cedb4f5b644404da6b6f3cad6af771a" Scale="1"/]I just start staring at one for a bit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
before I know it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the day's over!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="b5bdbec2f4f5467da14d5db905022b0d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Wow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you've done this much already...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You're not to be underestimated,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="8af78a846d5047149670446192fe68ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Wonderful![etc:Wait frame="15"/] So many cutie patooties![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You
must keep telling me about them!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="be0ce70e550e43bf999613ea82beaf99" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I like you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not as much as I like critters,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but quite a bit!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="76ea608b060e468185d9e802c9049d7e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]All these creatures are fantastic,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't
they?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just thinking about them makes my
heart swell with happiness!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="f0f3a699da8d446a9aac7db18deea5a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hello, hello![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Isn't it nice to think about
creatures for a change of pace?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="daf8773d9b7343fb854ed14addb1bb00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Imagination gives you the power to travel
to unknown worlds.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="daf8773d9b7343fb854ed14addb1bb00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If you're really good at imagining things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
like me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then you can do pretty much
anything in that world.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="daf8773d9b7343fb854ed14addb1bb00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]For example,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I let my imagination go
with the little darlings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can happily frolic
about with them!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="518aba1371a94dacb5e2e216be1f0bb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]As different creatures come to mind,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] try
observing them with care.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll want to
savor every second!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="3b0f49780c5a404f8f1c92b76f0a661a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When you see a critter for the first time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
don't get overexcited.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Approaching too
fast could startle it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Trust me on this...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3b0f49780c5a404f8f1c92b76f0a661a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Try a calm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] gradual approach while you
observe its territory and behaviors from
a distance.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="6a898c99f6c145b99da18505fdfefb32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By observing something over and over
again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can start to see things you
hadn't noticed before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6a898c99f6c145b99da18505fdfefb32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Like an extra eye or bulbous snout![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why
don't you take a look with me and share
your observations?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="0264394820d24973b310f6c5041fa7ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I want everyone to see the creatures of
this world and learn all about them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0264394820d24973b310f6c5041fa7ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]How wonderful would it be if we could all
picture these li'l beans in our minds and
appreciate how amazing they are!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="50649f8404a1467f882a0fb0c2f96eec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There's always something delightful about
imagining how creatures might react if you
threw different items at them, you know!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="f26aa9c288424e7893806aa0ca32a9f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I came to this planet with the spirit of
adventure in my heart after seeing
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s Voyage Log.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f26aa9c288424e7893806aa0ca32a9f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]To me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this is a paradise of discovery![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It
wouldn't be exaggerating to call it a
heaven full of beautiful beasties!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="190ee7852beb4645aae82fb6622ec3b8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Having someone else look at them means
an opportunity to see yet another side of
the creatures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="190ee7852beb4645aae82fb6622ec3b8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]A hundred individuals means a hundred
perspectives,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] each with their own
unique approach!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="334c4d98e1694354a700c43150c825b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Choosing which snuggle bean is my
favorite is impossible for me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="334c4d98e1694354a700c43150c825b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]This one has its heart-melting cuteness,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and that one has its awesome strength.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Each one is special in some way.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="334c4d98e1694354a700c43150c825b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]If asked to choose,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd just say all of them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
because I love them all equally!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="9df0a1667d264091b13714332cbc2096" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you're looking for new types of
creatures,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] why not start your search
in places you haven't fully explored?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9df0a1667d264091b13714332cbc2096" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]You may just happen upon a species that
you've never encountered before!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="de07f982ece94baa87547b02b663692d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]As someone who loves creatures and has
been loved by them in return,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I would never
ever harm the little darlings.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de07f982ece94baa87547b02b663692d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Even if my own life were in danger,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I just
wouldn't do it.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="0016ae45543c45f1ac1aa982b76c3766" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The creatures of this planet are so very
lively,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't they?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0016ae45543c45f1ac1aa982b76c3766" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Their overflowing wildness and abundant
vitality is enough to energize even me!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="a34d8d00c6bb4d2d8436e403b2ed8136" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I've made so many new discoveries while
reading through the Piklopedia.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't help
falling in love with all these squishy beans![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a34d8d00c6bb4d2d8436e403b2ed8136" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Come read the entries with me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We can be
enchanted by them together!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="fdd442ea3dec4c4fbf10a855bcc2a7e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Imagination gives you the power to travel
to unknown worlds.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fdd442ea3dec4c4fbf10a855bcc2a7e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If you're really good at imagining things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
like me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then you can do pretty much
anything in that world.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fdd442ea3dec4c4fbf10a855bcc2a7e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]For example,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I let my imagination go
with the little darlings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can happily frolic
about with them!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="6a7042fdad8c443d90279f2526a19de2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]As different creatures come to mind,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] try
observing them with care.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll want to
savor every second!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="8979d660f6ec42ec982f3aee37d3ee82" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By observing something over and over
again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can start to see things you
hadn't noticed before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8979d660f6ec42ec982f3aee37d3ee82" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Like an extra eye or bulbous snout![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why
don't you take a look with me and share
your observations?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="61699d5a9de0418b98f8cec654245a0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I want everyone to see the creatures of
this world and learn all about them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="61699d5a9de0418b98f8cec654245a0e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]How wonderful would it be if we could all
picture these li'l beans in our minds and
appreciate how amazing they are!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="10f87bfd822040c98339499e30c95591" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There's always something delightful about
imagining how creatures might react if you
threw different items at them, you know!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="7a2830d330d94f7587d3b1df6a593d71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I came to this planet with the spirit of
adventure in my heart after seeing
Captain Olimar's Voyage Log.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7a2830d330d94f7587d3b1df6a593d71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]To me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this is a paradise of discovery![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It
wouldn't be exaggerating to call it a
heaven full of beautiful beasties!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="0f8a2f3093174a029e812c9cc568fb48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Having someone else look at them means
an opportunity to see yet another side of
the creatures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f8a2f3093174a029e812c9cc568fb48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]A hundred individuals means a hundred
perspectives,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] each with their own
unique approach!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="41fb2396f24e4df09c46d17184dba49e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Choosing which snuggle bean is my
favorite is impossible for me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41fb2396f24e4df09c46d17184dba49e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]This one has its heart-melting cuteness,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and that one has its awesome strength.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Each one is special in some way.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41fb2396f24e4df09c46d17184dba49e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]If asked to choose,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd just say all of them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
because I love them all equally!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Continue_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="5476886155be42d19c77814600949935" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I could keep talking about creatures
for days on end!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="4f067094b3684322af1588a84eb71c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Why, hello there, little [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're just
as bright and exuberant as ever!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="0cb7f3c2d5f248bbabf8dd2489a80570" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]There, there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Aren't you just the cutest,
little [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="190b02dd56174e7c87d6e7bbed612cda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you want to have a really fun
time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] why don't we imagine the ecology of
various wild creatures together!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="09df24633be54257b277b018a308e26a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Sure thing![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let's picture herds and flocks
and schools of wild critters,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="dc895c67d6334ba2a1f25a7d5de688e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]How could you possibly pull yourself away
from these charming creatures?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Come see
me when you're ready to take another look.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Outro_A02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="c4eb706d410d4688a3ee0803b308839e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When it comes to creatures,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can talk
whenever,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] wherever,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and however often!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="a0403e7e6f7d4825a5be22fb4d632cfa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Your face is so full of love for creatures.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It gives me a powerful feeling of kinship
with you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_UnlockOlimar_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="822c10739a924550b07beb5d32edc6fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I got to hear from [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] about the
creatures here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="822c10739a924550b07beb5d32edc6fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Take a look at the Notes section.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll find
it full of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s brilliant observations!
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_UnlockLouie_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="636f902e4af0426fa0aa759d704e7d0d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I took down [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s comments about the
creatures he encountered...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="636f902e4af0426fa0aa759d704e7d0d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The content was a bit shocking, but it's a
type of love...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You can take a look...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
if you like.
SV006.SV006_Area500_Talk_UnlockOlimar_Louie_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="a26237104e91415082551da0a0aad1fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I had the pleasure of hearing about
creatures from both [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a26237104e91415082551da0a0aad1fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Their rather disparate Notes sections are
brimming with love and enthusiasm![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Be
sure to read them in their entirety!
